name: Great Time Out Camp
description: It's a great time to have a ball! Participants will have the opportunity to learn and play various sports, go indoor rock climbing with our experienced staff, and explore the beautiful outdoors of Glen Canyon Park. The sports will include basketball, soccer, archery, volleyball, and more. For archery, certified USA Archery Instructors will provide basic techniques that will develop a general feel for archery while building hand/eye coordination, concentration, and focus. By emphasizing team spir
